unit_rules.name: Tunneling Horrors
unit_rules.text: At the end of the Battle Round, if this unit is not within Melee Distance, it may be removed from the battlefield. At the start of the next Battle Round, set it up anywhere on the Battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally from all enemy models.

unit_rules.name: Plasmacyte
unit_rules.text: Remove a Plasmacyte token from this unit. Until the end of the Battle Round, this unit's melee weapons have +[Devastating Wounds]+. This ability may be activated once per attached Plasmacyte token per battle.
